IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDE AFFORDABLE HOUSING THROUGH RENTAL AND/OR DEVELOPMENT.
IRS990.MissionDesc: PROVIDES SERVICES IN ORDER TO IMPROVE THE HOUSING STOCK, ASSIST INDIVIDUALS TO BECOME HOMEOWNERS, AND PROVIDE DECENT HOUSING THAT IS AFFORDABLE TO LOW AND MODERATE INCOME PEOPLE WITH THE STATE OF RHODE ISLAND.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDES SERVICES IN ORDER TO IMPROVE THE HOUSING STOCK, ASSIST INDIVIDUALS TO BECOME HOMEOWNERS, AND PROVIDE DECENT HOUSING THAT IS AFFORDABLE TO LOW AND MODERATE INCOME PEOPLE WITH THE STATE OF RHODE ISLAND.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: INCOME TAX BENEFITS ARE RECOGNIZED FOR INCOME TAX POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN A TAX RETURN, ONLY WHEN IT IS DETERMINED THAT THE INCOME TAX POSITION WILL MORE-LIKELY-THAN-NOT BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY TAXING AUTHORITIES. THE ORGANIZATION HAS ANALYZED TAX POSITIONS TAKEN FOR FILING WITH THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE AND ALL STATE JURISDICTIONS WHERE IT OPERATES. MANAGEMENT BELIEVES THAT INCOME TAX FILING POSITIONS WILL BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION AND DOES NOT ANTICIPATE ANY ADJUSTMENTS THAT WOULD RESULT IN A MATERIAL ADVERSE EFFECT TO THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCIAL CONDITION, RESULTS OF OPERATIONS OR CASH FLOWS. ACCORDINGLY, THE ORGANIZATION HAS NOT RECORDED ANY RESERVES, OR RELATED ACCRUALS FOR INTEREST AND PENALTIES FOR UNCERTAIN INCOME TAX POSITIONS AT MARCH 31, 2018. GENERALLY, THE PAST THREE YEARS OF TAX RETURNS ARE OPEN FOR EXAMINATION BY TAXING AUTHORITIES, YEARS PRIOR TO 2015 ARE CLOSED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS AVAILABLE FOR REVIEW BY THE GOVERNING BOARD UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GOVERNING BODY ADHERES TO THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY THAT IS IN PLACE. THIS POLICY IS REVIEWED PERIODICALLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND FORM 990 ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

DirectControllingEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: MAIN STREET PHASE III DEVEL CORP
